titleInfo.title: North Sea, Germany, the Elbe from the Oste to Brunsbüttel and Krautsand (Raster Image)

name.namePart: United States. National Imagery and Mapping Agency

mods.abstract: Prepared and published by the National Imagery and Mapping Agency. Depths shown by isolines and soundings. Relief shown by spot heights. "From a German chart of 1998." Not distributed to depository libraries. Place names in German (Plattdeutsch), with glossary in English. "Copyright 1998 by the United States Government. No copyright claimed under Title 17 U.S.C." "Soundings in meters." Insets: A. The Oste from Geverdorf to Osten. Scale 1:50,120 -- B. Port and lock installations of Brunsbüttel. Scale 1:15,014 -- C. Port of Glückstadt. Scale 1:10,010 -- D. Dornbusch. Scale 1:30,158 -- E. The Stör from Wewelsfleth to Itzehoe. Scale 1:30,136 -- F. Itzehoe. Scale 1:30,170. Insets extend area of main map or of each other; except inset C, which enlarges an area on main map. Includes tidal information. Map No. 37228.
This map is part of a collection of scanned and georeferenced nautical charts produced by the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency (NGA).
mods.note: United States. National Imagery and Mapping Agency. (1998). North Sea, Germany, the Elbe from the Oste to Brunsbüttel and Krautsand (Raster Image). LandInfo. Available at: https://purl.stanford.edu/xn658tz2271
This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: This record was translated from ISO 19139 to MODS v.3 using an xsl transformation.

mods.accessCondition: These data are licensed by Stanford Libraries and are available to Stanford University affiliates only. Affiliates are limited to current faculty, staff and students. Non affiliates seeking access should contact the publisher directly. These data may not be reproduced or used for any purpose without permission
